Articles.Content:
Is there an existing mod that lets you track your kerbonaut's careers; logging hours of spaceflight, celestial bodies visited, craft flown in, etc? (ideally for the three prime suspects, as well as grey-suited rocket fodder)

Edited January 17, 2014 by Lar-E

Not that I'm aware of, but they should certainly put more stuff like that into the game. The Courage/Stupidity stats are nicely Kerbal, but it would also be cool to see more stats like that. Alas, I don't have enough room on my plate to tackle it myself. Ooh, it could even tie into the achievements mod (breaking the EVA and time in space records, all sorts of goodness).
I love that idea! Maybe I just need to get coding... (as if I needed more distractions!)
I've seen the idea floating around in various Suggestions and Development threads, but as far as I'm aware of, no one's taken it upon themselves to create that sort of thing as a mod yet.
I'd love a feature like this. Heck, I'd make it myself if I knew the first thing about modding.
Nope not that i know of if there was id probably us it.
There isn't a plugin for this, but it should be. It could get easily the first one installed by me every single time.
